competitors.name: Dassault Systèmes
competitors.notes: SOLIDWORKS and CATIA - comprehensive 3D CAD for manufacturing, aerospace, automotive

competitors.name: Bentley Systems
competitors.notes: MicroStation and infrastructure engineering software solutions

competitors.name: PTC
competitors.notes: CAD/CAM software and product lifecycle management solutions

competitors.name: Siemens
competitors.notes: PLM and CAD software for product development and manufacturing

competitors.name: Adobe
competitors.notes: Creative software competing in media and entertainment design space

competitors.name: Trimble
competitors.notes: Technology for construction, infrastructure, and geospatial mapping

context: By 2010, Autodesk faced a mature competitive landscape with established players like Dassault Systèmes, Bentley Systems, PTC, and Siemens. This period predates cloud-based CAD solutions like Onshape (founded 2012).
